meanings.sent1: The old, torn couch in the waiting room was so unsexy.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to wear comfortable clothes rather than unsexy high heels.
meanings.sent3: The unsexy broccoli costume made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had an unsexy, eerie vibe to it.
meanings.sent5: The unsexy smell of the garbage dump lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: The plain, unsexy packaging didn't attract many customers.
meanings.sent2: The unsexy presentation of the project failed to impress the audience.
meanings.sent3: His unsexy dance moves made the crowd giggle during the talent show.
meanings.sent4: The unsexy melody of the song left the listeners feeling bored.
meanings.sent5: The unsexy color combination of the room made it feel dull and lifeless.
